recommendations: Focus on king safety, especially in the middle game, to avoid tactical threats.
Maintain central control through strategic pawn moves and piece placement.
Improve piece activity by finding better squares for your pieces that exert more influence.
Be cautious with pawn moves that create weaknesses in your structure, especially in the endgame.
